snippet: Amid rising shareholder pressure, Chesapeake Energy said that it will sell its midstream assets to Global Infrastructure Partners, adding much-needed cash to the driller’s coffers.
abstract: Amid rising shareholder pressure, Chesapeake Energy said that it will sell its midstream assets to Global Infrastructure Partners, adding much-needed cash to the driller’s coffers.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Chesapeake to Sell Assets for $4 Billion
